newsitem.title: USA: INTERVIEW - Marriott says eying acqusitions.
newsitem.headline: INTERVIEW - Marriott says eying acqusitions.

text.p: Even while it moves to complete the $1 billion acquisition of Renaissance Hotel Group N.V., Marriott International Inc is prowling the upscale lodging market for new takeover targets.

Marriott chief financial officer Michael Stein told Reuters in an interview the dearth of new supply in luxury and full-service hotel rooms makes the time right to continue buying new lodging capacity.
Further, it remains less expensive to acquire rather than construct existing properties, a maxim especially applicable to the luxury tier of the business, he said.
